prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with blue scales and red wings soaring through the sky.
Imagine a powerful creature that commands the winds, featuring a sleek body and vibrant colors.
Generate a Pokemon design with a muscular physique and large wings, perfect for airborne battles.
Show me a majestic dragon with a striking color palette, known for its speed and agility.
Design a legendary Pokemon with a fierce appearance and a mix of blue and red hues.
Give me a fantasy creature that balances beauty and strength, ideal for epic adventures.
Make a dragon-style Pokemon that blends fierce looks with an enchanting personality.
